item.title: Banks Consider Seizing Hong Kong’s Worfu Mall After Loan Default
item.author: Bloomberg News (English)
item.description: (Bloomberg) -- Bank creditors are considering seizing control of a Hong Kong shopping center after a venture backed by Schroders Capital and Chelsfield’s Asia fund defaulted on a loan tied to the property, according to people familiar with the matter.
